Articles.Content: All the new footage has got me hype. Can't wait! (finally, trees)
Can't wait to get to play around with planes and the new wings, I have a couple of missions in mind already.
Excited for building bigger ships!
I am excited for new graphics and new system for making wings
i'm exited for interstellar travel!
I’m excited to finally explore beyond the Kerbol system with the new futuristic parts alongside my friends.

Honestly, pretty excited to do a space race with my cousins! I'm going to buy them copies literally as soon as the game goes on sale, that way they can get practice in before MP releases.

Edited February 22, 2023 by Missingno200
MY BANK ACCOUNT IS READY!
I'm really excited for the multiplayer; I think that'll open up a lot of doors for gameplay and also be a really interesting way for people to learn from each other.

Interstellar travel should be interesting! I'm excited to dig into the math behind sustained-thrust trajectories.

Colony management should be a fun addition, too!
I am excited for colony building mechanics being a stock feature instead of a mod.
Waiting to feel like child in space again

Just now, theAstrogoth said:

Interstellar travel should be interesting! I'm excited to dig into the math behind sustained-thrust trajectories.

Colony management should be a fun addition, too!

Even now, you should be able to experiment with them using ion thrusters. It'd be interesting to see what happens with an ion set to 0.5 thrust, and I look forward to seeing what that looks like.
Colonies and pretty much any other system (stock or modded) that can give a concrete "endgame" goal for all the other systems in place.
I'm excited for colonies and interstellar travel.
I'm excited for all of it. Even the bugs.

I'm very excited for the vast and endless opportunity's Ksp-2 will open up to modders

Edited February 22, 2023 by Royalswissarmyknife
I’m excited for everything! New parts, new planets, colonization. It’s adding everything KSP 1 didn’t have!
I'm really looking forward to making advanced motherships with specialized landers to explore upcoming interstellar content!
Excited to experience the redesigned planets and start exploring all over again
I am excited for playing this wonderful game with some friends.

3 minutes ago, Bej Kerman said:

Even now, you should be able to experiment with them using ion thrusters. It'd be interesting to see what happens with an ion set to 0.5 thrust, and I look forward to seeing what that looks like.

True! I haven't yet gotten around to using ion thrusters with BetterTimeWarp, but trying them out for very long/low-thrust burns could be fun!
So excited for multiplayer! Working on joint space missions with friends will be so fun and rewarding.
Pretty excited for multiplayer,  as there is only one mod I think for KSP 1 and it works somewhat well, but official support  would be awesome.
I'm excited about where this journey will eventually take all of us.
I'm looking forward to seeing the program develop through its early versions as new features are added, recapturing the wild and woolly exciting days of playing the alpha versions of KSP 1.
